liceu

Class SituatieMaterieBaza

  • java.lang.Object
    • liceu.SituatieMaterieBaza

  • public class SituatieMaterieBaza
extends java.lang.Object
    An istance of this class will retain all the grades and absences of a student during a year od study.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SituatieMaterieBaza.Absenta
      An istance of this class represents an absence.
      static class  SituatieMaterieBaza.Semestru
      This enumeration is used when computing the average.
